text: Peter John Whiting (born 6 August 1946) is a former New Zealand rugby union player. A lock, Whiting represented Auckland at a provincial level, and was a member of the New Zealand national side, the All Blacks, from 1971 to 1976, and was known as a superb lineout expert. He played 56 matches for the All Blacks including 20 internationals. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:People from Auckland Category:People educated at Auckland Grammar School Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:New Zealand international rugby union players Category:Auckland rugby union players Category:Rugby union locks
title: Peter Whiting (rugby union)
